convert.step_3: Lead history will be linked to the opportunity
convert.error: Failed to convert lead to opportunity

delete.title: Delete Lead
delete.warning: This action cannot be undone. The lead will be removed from your pipeline.

delete.gdpr_notice_description: Data will be permanently deleted to comply with GDPR Article 17 (Right to Erasure).
delete.confirm_label: Type DELETE to confirm permanent deletion

delete_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this opportunity? This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: CRM Settings
settings.description: Configure pipeline stages, loss reasons, and other CRM settings

leadStages.title: Lead Stages
leadStages.description: Configure the stages for your lead pipeline. Drag to reorder.
leadStages.empty: No lead stages configured. Add your first stage to get started.

opportunityStages.title: Opportunity Stages
opportunityStages.description: Configure the stages for your sales pipeline with probability and max days.
opportunityStages.empty: No opportunity stages configured. Add your first stage to get started.

pipeline.opportunityStageModalDescription: Configure the opportunity stage properties including probability and max days.

lead.title: Lead Pipeline Preview
lead.description: Visual representation of your lead stages

opportunity.title: Opportunity Pipeline Preview
opportunity.description: Visual flow of your opportunity stages with probability

dealRotting.title: Deal Rotting Detection
dealRotting.description: Automatically detect opportunities that have been inactive too long in a stage.
dealRotting.useStageMaxDaysDesc: Each stage has its own max days threshold (configured above)
dealRotting.globalThresholdDesc: Apply the same threshold to all stages
dealRotting.alertOwnerDesc: Send email notification to the opportunity owner
dealRotting.alertManagerDesc: Include rotting deals in daily manager digest
dealRotting.cronInfo: The system will check for rotting deals daily at this time and send alerts if any are found.

errors.maxDaysMin: Max days must be at least 1
errors.saveFailed: Failed to save. Please try again.

lossReasons.title: Loss Reasons
lossReasons.description: Configure reasons for lost opportunities. Group them by category to understand why deals are lost.
lossReasons.addReasonDesc: Create a new loss reason for tracking lost opportunities.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Loss Reason
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this loss reason? This action cannot be undone.

fields.isRecoverableDesc: Enable follow-up after a delay to attempt recovery
fields.recoveryDelayDesc: Days to wait before scheduling a follow-up
fields.requireCompetitorDesc: Require entering competitor name when selecting this reason

recovery.title: Recovery Workflow
recovery.description: Configure automatic actions for recovering lost opportunities marked as recoverable.
recovery.autoFollowupDesc: Automatically create a follow-up task when recovery date is reached
recovery.sendReminderDesc: Send email notification to opportunity owner before recovery date
recovery.autoReopenDesc: Automatically reopen the opportunity when recovery date is reached
recovery.autoReopenWarning: Use with caution - this will reopen opportunities automatically without user action
recovery.info: These settings only apply to opportunities marked as lost with a recoverable reason. The recovery date is calculated based on each reason's recovery delay.

errors.duplicateValue: A reason with this name already exists
errors.invalidRecoveryDelay: Recovery delay must be between 1 and 365 days

quotes.title: Quotes
quotes.description: Manage quotes and proposals for your opportunities

validation.items_required: At least one line item is required

calculations.title: Quote Summary
calculations.add_items: Add line items to see calculations

send_modal.title: Send Quote
send_modal.description: Send this quote to the customer via email
send_modal.message_placeholder: Add a personal message to the email...
send_modal.warning: Once sent, the quote status will change to 'Sent' and cannot be edited.
send_modal.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address

convert_modal.title: Convert to Order
convert_modal.description: Create an order from this accepted quote
convert_modal.effective_date_hint: The date when the order becomes effective
convert_modal.order_created: A new order will be created
convert_modal.quote_converted: This quote status will change to 'Converted'
convert_modal.items_copied: All line items will be copied to the order

delete_modal.title: Delete Quote
delete_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this quote? This action cannot be undone.
delete_modal.items_warning: This will also delete {{count}} line item(s).

timeline.empty_description: Activities will appear here as interactions occur
